SELECT j.* FROM jobs AS j JOIN job_tag AS jt ON (j.id = jt.job_id AND j.inappropriate_content = :appropriate AND j.status in (:status)) JOIN tags AS t ON (jt.tag_id = t.id AND t.tag_name LIKE (:searchedTag)) GROUP BY j.id
select usr.id, usr.name, usr.pic, uj.status from user usr join user_job uj on usr.id = uj.userId And uj.jobId=:jobId and uj.status IN (:userJobStatus);

SELECT *, CASE WHEN X.tagIds = :tagIdsString THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS jobOrder FROM ( SELECT j.*, GROUP_CONCAT(t.id) AS tagIds FROM jobs AS j JOIN job_tag AS jt ON (j.id = jt.job_id AND j.inappropriate_content = :appropriate AND j.status in (:status)) JOIN tags AS t ON (jt.tag_id = t.id AND t.id IN (:tagIds)) GROUP BY j.id ) AS X ORDER BY jobOrder ASC
INSERT INTO user_job(userId, jobId, status) VALUES(:userId, :jobId, :status)
DELETE FROM user_job WHERE userId = :userId AND jobId = :jobId
UPDATE user_job SET status = :status WHERE userId = :userId AND jobId = :jobId

SELECT X.* FROM ( SELECT t.*, CASE WHEN ut.user_id > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS tagOrder FROM job_tag jt JOIN tags t ON jt.tag_id = t.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM user_tag WHERE user_id = :userId) ut ON jt.tag_id = ut.tag_id GROUP BY jt.tag_id ) AS X ORDER BY X.tagOrder ASC
SELECT j.* FROM jobs j JOIN user_job uj ON j.id = uj.jobId AND uj.userId = :userId
SELECT DISTINCT(user_id) FROM user_tag WHERE tag_id IN (:tagIds)
SELECT count(*) from notification where to_user = :userId and is_read = 0;

SELECT nt.id, nt.from_user, nt.to_user, ntt.type, nt.object_id, usr.name, jb.job_title, temp.note, nt.is_read FROM notification nt LEFT JOIN notification_type ntt on (nt.notification_type = ntt.type) LEFT JOIN template_notification_type_map tnm ON (ntt.id = tnm.notification_type_id) LEFT JOIN template temp ON (tnm.temp_id = temp.id) LEFT JOIN jobs jb ON (nt.object_id = jb.id) LEFT JOIN user usr ON (nt.from_user = usr.id) where nt.to_user = :userId order by nt.created desc;
UPDATE notification SET is_read = 1 WHERE to_user = :userId
